guest_bio.description: Tell us about your journey as a tattoo artist (2-3 paragraphs)

tattoo_style.title: Primary Tattoo Style
tattoo_style.description: e.g., Watercolor, Realism, Traditional, Japanese, etc.

portfolio_images.title: Portfolio Images
portfolio_images.description: Upload 6-10 high-quality images of your best work

discussion_topics.title: Discussion Topics (Select all that apply)
discussion_topics.description: Choose 3-5 topics you'd love to discuss on the show. These help us create targeted social media content leading up to your episode!

custom_topics.title: Additional Topics or Questions
custom_topics.description: Have other topics or specific questions you'd like to address? Tell us here! This open-ended field lets you share what's really on your mind.

preferred_air_date.title: Preferred Air Date (Optional)
preferred_air_date.description: Do you have a preferred date or time frame for your episode?

booking_preference.title: Booking Preference
booking_preference.description: How do you prefer clients book with you?
